title: Use of Appropriated Funds for Illegal Lobbying and Partisan Political Activity by Federal Grantees
summary: The document is a presidential memorandum issued on August 28, 2025, directing the Attorney General to investigate the use of federal grant funds for illegal lobbying and partisan political activities. The memorandum highlights concerns about the misuse of taxpayer money, which is prohibited by federal law. The Attorney General is tasked with reporting progress within 180 days. The memorandum also includes general provisions to ensure compliance with applicable laws and the availability of appropriations.
